Package de.htwsaar.vs.gruppe05.server.rest

Klasse RestExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
de.htwsaar.vs.gruppe05.server.rest.RestExceptionHandler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware
@RestControllerAdvice public class RestExceptionHandler extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Rest Exception Handler
Version:
20.02.2023 Handles Application wide Exceptions and generates generic Response
